Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Kulibe Al-Dhuha	655 munthu amene akapsye nawo kupatula munthu wochita zoipa
Amene amakana choonadi ndipo safuna kumvera chenjezo
Koma anthu onse olungama, adzatalikirana nawo
Amene amapereka chaulere chake poonjezera kudziyeretsa
Osati chifukwa chakuti afuna kupezako cholowa ayi
Kupatula ndi cholinga chopeza chisomo cha Ambuye wake, wapamwamba mwamba
Ndithudi iye adzasangalala
Pali usana
Ndi pali usiku pamene ulipo
Ambuye wako sadakutaye iwe ndiponso sakudana nawe ayi
Ndipo, ndithudi, moyo umene uli nkudza ndi wabwino kwa iwe kuposa moyo uno
Ndithudi Ambuye wako adzakupatsa, ndipo iwe chidzakukondweretsa
Kodi sadakupeze iwe uli wa masiye ndipo adakupatsa malo okhala
Kodi sadakupeze uli wosochera ndipo Iye adakutsogolera
Kodi sadakupeze iwe waumphawi ndipo adakulemeretsa
Motero iwe usapondereze pansi mwana wa masiye
Ndipo usapirikitse munthu wopempha
Koma lengeza chisomo cha a Ambuye wako
Kodi Ife sitidatsegule chifuwa chako
Ndi kukuchotsa katundu wako wolemera
Amene amalemetsa msana wako
Ndipo tidakweza mbiri yako yabwino
Ndithudi m’mavuto muli chithandizo
Ndithudi m’mavuto muli chithandizo
Ndipo pamene wamaliza, pembedza Mulungu
Ndipo dzipereke kwathunthu kwa Ambuye wako
